Title: Needed to adjust text size
Review: Tried to start the Covid Tracer App on my iPhone 8 but the ‚Äúcontinue‚Äù button overlapped the toggle and I could not turn on the app.  After some tinkering I had to adjust the text size in settings to separate the ‚Äúcontinue‚Äù button from the toggle and I was then able to turn the app on.

Title: Time stamp problem - NOW FIXED
Review:
Now that I have the app installed for a few days now every time I open the app the page says ‚Äú No exposures found within the last hour ‚Äú. Then underneath that is always says ‚ÄúLast checked 5:30pm‚Äù.  Well 5:30pm was 23 hours ago so how would it know I didn‚Äôt have exposure In the last hour if the last time it checked was 23 hours ago?  Something isn‚Äôt right or this app isn‚Äôt working properly. Which is it?

Update,  No the update to version 1.1 did not corrected the problem.  I even uninstalled and reinstalled.  No matter what time stamp does not change.

Update - app is now fixed with latest update.  Changing from 2 stars to 5 stars.  Now I just wish more people would get the app so we can really know if we are being exposed.

Title: Back to 5 stars
Review: Nevada COVID Trace app back to working great. Recently, since iOS 14.2, I was getting ‚Äòunable to connect to server.‚Äô Deleted app, reinstalled it, shut-down iPhone 8, - when I opened the app (after reinstall) it did show a current time. However, when checking again, I got the same ‚Äòunable to connect to server‚Äô message, with no time update. Later today app is functioning as it should again - updating time-stamp for ‚Äòlast‚Äô exposure check.

Title: Not Accurate or Effective-Just Tracks the Individual
Review: I personally have discovered at least 10 people I have been within close proximity had tested positive for the virus and 8 had the NV app on their phone as well.. Notably, it was not told to me until after they had quarantined for at least 2 weeks. Also, I have been tested 3 times and all were negative. Regardless, the app never alerted I had been exposed. This app clearly is mainly tracking the individual‚Äôs who load it, not really whether they have been exposed as it indicates. Do not recommend using it for anything other than quick access to statistics.  Personally, I deleted the app.

Title: Unable to connect to server
Review:
The COVID Trace Nevada app seemed to work for a few days, but now does not update the time of last check. When I try to force an update, it tells me that it cannot connect to its server. I recently updated to iOS 13.7, perhaps this was the cause? The app was initially installed on iOS 13.6.1 and appeared to work. App is up to date.

Update: Despite developer assurances, the new version of the app still cannot connect to server, even after a delete-and-reinstall. Perhaps a spurious error message? After the re-install, the last check time DID update. Once.

Title: Accessibility Settings
Review: You need to address the bug that has been mentioned others. The slider needs to be dynamic so that those that have larger dynamic text turned on can access it. This is going to frustrate a lot of people that that might just delete the app because of this.

Title: Please advertiser more
Review:
We need was many possible people to use it, INCLUDING visitors to the state. Are all hotels, medical facilities, hospitals & colleges putting it in their welcome packages? This will help get our tourism economy back on track of we can get everyone to use it.
Social media too!

Title: Not helping
Review: I don‚Äôt understand. Is this to help people or to frustrate them? I tried to register myself as someone that tested positive for Covid. Your app would not let me do it unless I had a confirmation number. If someone gave me such a number I was too sick to hear it.. Why are you making it difficult for people to help each other? Isn‚Äôt that the purpose of the app? You must find an easier way for people to register their information.

Title: App wants a special number I don‚Äôt have access to
Review: I only downloaded the app so I could alert people I have been in contact with that I am positive for covid currently BUT the app wants a verification 8 digit number from a health official that I do not have ??? I have my test results and this number they‚Äôre asking for does not exist. I guess I can‚Äôt warn anybody and my boyfriend also has covid but it says there are no active warnings in my area lol I AM the active warning

Title: FRUSTRATING

I have reinstalled it several times and I still continue to get the same message ‚Äúexposure notification off‚Äù because my bluetooth is off. It‚Äôs on. When the app did work, I never had my bluetooth on. ü§î Very frustrating and not sure it‚Äôs worth any more of my time. As I read the reviews it appears I‚Äôm not the only one feeling this way. üòï

So, I unfortunately deleted it since it‚Äôs basically useless. If they ever get it working I might consider downloading again.

Title: This app is a joke
Review: I doubt this app is working I had it on my phone for over two weeks now and for the past two weeks I‚Äôve been in every place in Vegas it didn‚Äôt notify me once that I‚Äôve been exposed to the virusI i mean I‚Äôve been to grocery stores restaurants casinos and work it‚Äôs impossible that I haven‚Äôt been near someone with a virus and have the app on his phone but somehow I never got notified

Title: App no longer works after recent update
Review: App no longer functional since most recent update (4 days ago from this review). App now says exposure notifications are off because background data fetch is off. It‚Äôs on and the app won‚Äôt recognize this...plus the previous version didn‚Äôt have this issue. Massive failure during a massive outbreak, great work devs!

Title: Tracking
Review: This app does not give you a day or time when you have been checked. I tried it for a few days and it always said no exposure and it always said the checking time was the same time each day. I need more information before I sign up again for this app. It‚Äôs a good idea how ever it needs a date of when you were checked.

Title: New Update
Review: I‚Äôm not going to use this anymore. After the new update, one has to have ‚ÄòBackground App Refresh‚Äô turned on in iOS. I don‚Äôt like that setting on as it wastes battery life, and most apps don‚Äôt need to be refreshing on their own if your not connected to cellular data or Wifi. Plus, this app isn‚Äôt going to really help if people aren‚Äôt inputting their positive tests.

Title: How do you obtain 7 digit code
Review: When you test positive it asks for a seven digit code. How do you obtain this code if you do test positive and it was through drive up or home kit tests? Where do you get the code if your doctor/ health official does not have it? A lot of people are deleting this app because of the code on Apple and google. Can the developer please help.

Title: Can‚Äôt log positive test result
Review: I tested positive and I want to be able to keep others aware and safe. That‚Äôs why I got the app, and I was expecting it to be easy, but then it asks for a verification code from my doctor? I didn‚Äôt see a doctor. This was a drive up test, and I never got a verification number. I get that it needs to be real that someone is positive, but there has to be an easier way. Why make it hard for us to help each other stay safe? That‚Äôs what the app is for, so why make it so a majority of people can‚Äôt even log if they‚Äôre positive?

Title: What Code?
Review: I tested positive; however, trace app is requesting a 7 digit code, and I wasn‚Äôt provided one. Useless

Title: Reporting isn‚Äôt working

Title: Completely useless

Title: Providers don‚Äôt all have codes

How is contact tracing supposed to work if not all providers know about the app or how to get codes to use in the app?

Title: Dysfunctional

Title: Does Not Trace Contacts
Review:

Based on the timing of his likely exposure I am okay, but if positive cases can‚Äôt even log their positive result this app is futile.

Title: Worthless

8/28/2020 update:  The issue appears to be fixed now and the app is working on my iPhone 7.  Thanks!

Title: Can‚Äôt put in positive test
